metadata.info: glam2scan [options] alphabet my_motif.glam2 my_seqs.fa Alphabets: p = proteins, n = nucleotides, other = alphabet file Options (default settings): -h: show all options and their default settings -o: output file (stdout) -n: number of alignments to report (25) -2: examine both strands - forward and reverse complement -D: deletion pseudocount (0.1) -E: no-deletion pseudocount (2.0) -I: insertion pseudocount (0.02) -J: no-insertion pseudocount (1.0) -d: Dirichlet mixture file
